Name: Extend Desktop
About the game: Extended Desktop is a tool application that extends the four-sided area of a computer desktop. When the mouse moves to four drawers around the desktop, users can store applications, files and folders in four drawers, reducing the number of desktop icons. Realize desktop zero icon!
